16.title: Episode #3.16

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

17.title: Episode #3.17

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

17.plot: Samantha Bee takes one small step for women and one giant leap for mankind by getting to know Donald Trump Jr. Unrelated, we also interview a group of people who want to leave the planet and form a new space nation.

18.title: Episode #3.18

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

18.plot: Full Frontal examines yet another way in which women get screwed over in the workplace and discovers the one thing all of Donald Trump's scandals have in common: Donald Trump Jr. Plus, the correspondents take a page out of Sean Spicer's book...literally.

19.title: Episode #3.19

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

19.plot: Full Frontal presents a "who's who" of the country's up and coming fascists, cooks up a lesson on undocumented food workers with Padma Lakshmi, and enjoys a good healing cry while listening to Brandi Carlile.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Samantha Bee goes on the road with the Jeb Bush campaign.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Full Frontal goes to a Syrian to visit a refugee camp and to examine whether Syrian refugees really pose a serious security risk to the United States. It also discusses the death of Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia and looks at the recent Republican and Democratic debates.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Full Frontal looks at the the recent Republican primary in South Carolina and examines sexual harassment at the workplace. Samantha also examines the Syrian refugee crisis and talks to some refuges who were resettled in New Jersey. She also looks at the classes Syrian refugees must take in order to settle in America.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Sam sends a correspondent to an abortion clinic in Texas to see how new restrictions are making life even more difficult for women seeking an abortion.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Samantha discusses the loss of a great political institution, the Democratic debate in Michigan, and a new approach to combat school shootings.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Trump Voters. Sam meets with Trump voters and listens to them respectfully while the Full Frontal Fact Checker patiently watches.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Full Frontal follows a delegation from the American Atheists on what seems like a doomed mission: to spread their message to the right-wing attendees of CPAC, the Conservative Political Action Conference.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Eddie Eagle. Sam does everything in her power to hunt down the NRA's mascot

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Bernie Voters. Sam sits down with a panel of Bernie supporters to try to understand their point of view.

10.title: Guantanamo Bay

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Samantha travels to Germany to speak with a former Guantanamo Bay prisoner.

11.title: Crisis Pregnancy Centers

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Exploring the ultimate con: Crisis Pregnancy Centers.

12.title: Super PACs

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Sam sits down with a Super PAC donor to discuss his contributions.

13.title: Vaping

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: Samantha punishes her friend and producer Allana Harkin by sending her to an e-cigarette convention, an assignment that Harkin unexpectedly enjoys.

14.title: Gary Johnson

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: Sam talks to Gary Johnson, the Libertarian Party's 2016 candidate for President.

15.title: Libertarian Convention

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

15.plot: What can we learn from the mass shooting in Orlando? Whatever it is, you can count on our elected officials to ignore it.

16.title: Tribal Courts

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

16.plot: Full Frontal takes a trip to a Native American tribal court and explores the debate over tribal sovereignty.

17.title: Muslim-American Reporting

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

17.plot: Full Frontal visits a Muslim-American community to see if they're reporting terrorists to the police.

18.title: Cleveland

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

18.plot: Full Frontal visits Cleveland to see how the city is preparing for the Republican National Convention.

19.title: Special: Full Frontal Election Documentary

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

19.plot: In this new documentary film from the makers of Full Frontal, Samantha Bee accidentally discovers America on her way to the conventions.

20.title: Republican National Convention

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

20.plot: Sam visits the Republican National Convention in Cleveland, Ohio.

21.title: Democratic National Convention

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

21.plot: Sam visits the Democratic National Convention in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

22.title: Latinos for Trump

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

22.plot: Full Frontal speaks with the Mexican immigrant behind Latinos for Trump.

23.title: Super Lobbyist

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

23.plot: In order to get a better understanding of the Democratic Party's optics problem, Sam sits down with a superdelegate who is also a lobbyist.

24.title: Presidential Debate Special

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

24.plot: Fear and Loathing at Hofstra University: All of Donald Trump's no hard work finally paid off. Go Ahead, Make Her Day: Hillary had the audacity to come prepared to Monday's debate. Advice She Didn't Ask For: Thanks for weighing in, but it looks like Hillary Clinton is doing just fine without the help of body language experts. Debate Watchers: Our contributors visited two debate parties to see who won the debate. We lost. Dancing Near the Stars: In a shocking turn of events, we'd like to congratulate Rick Perry.

25.title: Rigged!

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

25.plot: Meet the Veeps: At the VP Debate, two adult men argued loudly over one another while America sat, unenthused. Maine's Personal Trump: Meet the man who was Trump before Trump was Trump. Rigged!!!: Allana Harkin and Amy Hoggart spoke to folks who are convinced that this election is most definitely rigged, sort of. Party Like It's 1997: A simpler time for Donald Trump. An objectively worse clusterfuck for everyone else.

26.title: Super-Sized Sneak Peek Debate Special

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

26.plot: COLD OPEN FOREVER UNCLEAN: Debates really get into every nook and cranny. PUSSY RIOT: This was not the October Surprise Trump expected, but it is the one he deserves. GOP FEAR THE P: A known hateful, alt-right, racist demagogue said something awful about women and we are reeling from the surprise!!! DEBATE 2: MISERY IN MISSOURI: Donald Trump took a break from grabbing at pussies to grasp at straws. WE THOUGHT WE WERE DONE WITH THIS: We've got to give it to Trump: he may be losing, but he definitely is trying to ruin everything for the rest of us, too.

27.title: United Nations

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

27.plot: DEBATE 3: THE GOOD, THE BAD, THE NASTY (PART 1): Our thoughts on the final debate... possibly ever. DEBATE 3: THE GOOD, THE BAD, THE NASTY (PART 2): Donald Trump made American women's election cycles sync. FIRST: DO NO HARM. SECOND: DO NO PUSSY STUFF: Catholic hospitals want you to leave a little room in your womb for Jesus. OK LADIES NOW LET'S GET INFORMATION: As it turns out, women actually can be president...of other countries. Sam and Madeleine Albright find out more. NASTY WOMEN, ASSEMBLE!: Buy a shirt for the nasty woman in your life. 100% of net proceeds go to ...

28.title: President Obama

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

28.plot: COLD OPEN - ORANGE FEELINGS MATTER: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but jokes can shatter an adult man into a million pieces. FEELIN' ALT-RIGHT (PART 1): We were very shocked and confused to find something bad on the internet. FEELIN' ALT-RIGHT (PART 2): You say tomato, we say "you can't pass off hate speech as satire." RUSSIAN THINKFLUENCERS: Trump says Russia isn't influencing our election, and so do these Russian trolls who are being paid to influence our election. A TOTALLY REAL, 100% VALID THEORY: Join us for the very special first installment of our ...

episode of.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee (TV Series 2016– )

29.plot: Sam travels to Moscow, decides not to move her show there.

imdb.plot outline: One of the most unique and visible comedic voices on television is coming to TBS in Full Frontal with Samantha Bee. Breaking up late-night's all-male sausage fest, this new show from the longtime Daily Show correspondent will feature Samantha's nuanced view of political and cultural issues, her sharp interview skills and her repartee with world leaders.
imdb.title: Full Frontal with Samantha Bee
plot: Comedian Samantha Bee gives her own wry commentary to the contemporary issues of the day.::Kenneth Chisholm

One of the most unique and visible comedic voices on television is coming to TBS in _Full Frontal with Samantha Bee_ (qv). Breaking up late-night's all-male sausage fest, this new show from the longtime Daily Show correspondent will feature Samantha's nuanced view of political and cultural issues, her sharp interview skills and her repartee with world leaders.::TBS
